        public static java.util.Calendar createCalendar(java.util.Locale locale,

        Parameters:

      • createFormatter

        public static java.text.Format createFormatter(char formatType,
                               java.lang.String locale,
                               java.lang.String format)
        Creates Decimal/Date format depending on data field type
        Parameters:
        formatType - field type; for DateDataField there is created DateFormat , for all numeric fields there is created DecimalFormat, for other fields returns null
        locale - locale in Clover internat format
        format - format string
        Returns:
        DecimalFormat, DateFormat or null

      • resetRecords

      • getEnvSafe

        public static java.lang.String getEnvSafe(java.lang.String envVariableName)
        Wrapper for method System.getenv(String) method. Possible SecurityException is caught and null is returned. Null value is returned even for null variable name.

      • getInOutRecordsMessage

        public static java.lang.String getInOutRecordsMessage(Node component)
        Returns information about number of received and sent records from/to the given component. The resulted string could look like 'In0: 15, In1: 30, Out0:5'
